name: image-color-inverter
title: Image Color Inverter
description: Invert colors to create negative effect using ImageOps
content:
Overview

This application inverts image colors to create a negative effect. Built using Pillow with ImageOps.invert, it produces artistic negative images.

Features

  • Inverts all RGB color channels
  • Creates photographic negative effect
  • Preserves alpha channel for transparent images
  • Maintains original image dimensions

Parameters

  • Input Image: Upload your image file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates an inverted image with the suffix _inverted in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Creating artistic negative effects
  • Analyzing image color distributions
  • Producing unique visual effects
  • Design and creative experiments
command: REPO_DIR="prod_apps"; rm -rf "$REPO_DIR" 2>/dev/null || true; git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git "$REPO_DIR" && python "$REPO_DIR/python/image_color_inverter.py" "${inputFile}" -o "${outputDir}"
